name: Tic Tac Toe: Retro Board Game!
name_original: Tic Tac Toe: Retro Board Game!
description:
The classic pencil and paper game, re-imagined for iPhone and iPad!

Designed for players of all skill levels - the AI will adjust to your skill level to ensure that you always have a reasonable amount of challenge. With clean, simple graphics and no timers this is the ultimate version of Tic Tac Toe / Noughts & Crosses.

Download now for free!
